Parameter.description: The token for authentication.(Send authToken as query parameter, body parameter or as a header)
title of the product passed as a body parameter
name of the product passed as a body parameter
price of the product passed as a body parameter
description of the product passed as a body parameter
coupon of the product passed as a body parameter
freeDelivery of the product passed as a body parameter
inStock of the product passed as a body parameter
category of the product passed as a body parameter

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
    "error": false,
    "message": "Product Created successfully",
    "status": 200,
    "data": [
                {
                      productId:"string",
                      title: "string",
                      name: "string",
                      price: "Number",
                      description:"string",
                      coupon: "string",
                      freeDelivery:"string",
                      inStock: "string",
                      category:"string",
                      imageLink:"string",
                      sizes: object(type = array),
                      reviews: object(type = array),
                      created: today,
                      lastModified: today
                                  
   
                }
            ]
        }
    }
}
